articles.title: Tarak Sinha, legendary cricket coach and Dronacharya Awardee, dies aged 71 - India Today
articles.description: Tarak Sinha, who has worked with India cricketers from across generations, died on Saturday aged 71 after battling lung cancer for a while. Sinha's celebrated wards include Shikhar Dhawan, Anjum Chopra and Rishabh Pant.
